subtitleNullable: 2225 documents from the BBC news website classified by category
descriptionNullable:
This is a dataset which consists of **2225 documents** from the BBC news website corresponding to stories in five topical areas from 2004-2005. These documents are classified into **5 different categories**: *business, entertainment, politics, sport, tech*.

Github: https://github.com/DimasDMM/text-classification
Source: http://mlg.ucd.ie/datasets/bbc.html - D. Greene and P. Cunningham. "Practical Solutions to the Problem of Diagonal Dominance in Kernel Document Clustering", Proc. ICML 2006. [[PDF]](http://mlg.ucd.ie/files/publications/greene06icml.pdf)
title: BBC Articles Cleaned
subtitle: 2225 documents from the BBC news website classified by category
